events.message: I recently received my order but want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The case has been identified as a refund request based on customer message content.
Support agent Alice Johnson has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and specify the reasons why you would like a refund?
My order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description and was not as described on your website.
We can initiate a refund process for you immediately. Kindly send the item back and we'll refund the full amount once received.
Thank you for your quick response. I will send back the item as you advised and look forward to the refund.
We have received your returned product and processed the refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect in your account.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and everything is in order.
Since your refund has been completed and confirmed, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
